Package game.movement

Class FollowFoodBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.movement.FollowBehaviour
game.movement.FollowFoodBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class FollowFoodBehaviour
extends FollowBehaviour
Special class that simulates behaviour of a DinoActor moving towards an instance of Food that it can eat.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.lang.String DESCRIPTION
    Description of the motivation of the behaviour to be printed out as a message in the console if the Actor actually moves towards Food in the end.
    private static int MAX_RADIUS
    Maximum number of squares from DinoActor to search for Food to move towards.
    private static int MIN_RADIUS
    Minimum number of squares from DinoActor to start searching for Food to move towards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    FollowFoodBehaviour()
    Constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) Location findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if there is Food that the DinoActor can eat at location destination.
    (package private) boolean motivatedToFind​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor is hungry to indicate that it will attempt to follow Food around it, false otherwise.

    Methods inherited from class game.movement.FollowBehaviour

    getAction

  • Method Details

    • motivatedToFind

      boolean motivatedToFind​(DinoActor dinoActor)
      Returns true if the DinoActor is hungry to indicate that it will attempt to follow Food around it, false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      motivatedToFind in class FollowBehaviour
      Parameters:
      dinoActor - DinoActor that is acting
      Returns:
      true if DinoActor is hungry, false otherwise

    • findTarget

      Location findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
      Checks if there is Food that the DinoActor can eat at location destination. If there is, the destination will be returned for the DinoActor to move towards it, null will be returned otherwise.
      Specified by:
      findTarget in class FollowBehaviour
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap that the Actor is currently on
      destination - Location that is checked for Food
      dinoActor - DinoActor that is trying to find Food
      Returns:
      A location if there is Food that DinoActor can eat, null otherwise
